prompt:
Create a service page with this brief:

Page Type: Service Page
Primary Keyword: emergency plumber boston
Secondary Keywords: 24/7 plumber boston, same day plumbing boston, urgent plumber
Intent: Transactional (high purchase intent)
User: Homeowner with urgent plumbing issue needing immediate help
Conversion Goal: Phone call booking
Brand: Boston Best Plumbing
Brand Voice: Professional, trustworthy, emphasize speed
expectations: Creates complete page with H1 containing primary keyword
Meta title is 50-60 characters and includes keyword
Meta description is 150-160 characters with CTA
Includes clear service description and process
Multiple CTAs (phone number, call buttons) for transactional intent

prompt:
Build a blog post:

Page Type: Blog Post (How-to)
Primary Keyword: how to build backlinks
Secondary Keywords: link building strategies, get quality backlinks, backlink techniques
Intent: Informational
User: SEO beginner wanting to learn link building
Conversion Goal: Soft CTA to guide/service
Word Count Target: 2,000-2,500 words
expectations: Creates detailed how-to structure with numbered steps
Introduction hooks reader and previews content
Each step is actionable and specific
Soft CTAs appropriate for informational intent

prompt:
Create location page:

Page Type: Location Page
Primary Keyword: dentist in austin
Secondary Keywords: austin dental clinic, family dentist austin, cosmetic dentistry austin
Intent: Transactional/Local
User: Austin resident looking for local dentist
Location: Austin, TX
Business: Smile Dental Austin
Services: General dentistry, cosmetic dentistry, emergency dental
Conversion Goal: Appointment booking
expectations: H1 includes service and location naturally
Lists services offered in this location
Local trust signals (years in Austin, local team)
Avoids thin content with unique local details

prompt:
Create comparison page:

Page Type: Comparison Page
Primary Keyword: asana vs monday
Secondary Keywords: project management comparison, asana vs monday.com, best project management software
Intent: Commercial investigation
User: Team lead comparing project management tools before purchasing
Conversion Goal: Demo signup for our tool (ProjectFlow)
Angle: Position ProjectFlow as third alternative
expectations: Comparison table at top for quick overview
Objective analysis of both Asana and Monday
Clear use case recommendations (when to choose which)
Introduces ProjectFlow as alternative option naturally
No blatant bias while still positioning offering

prompt:
Create 3 service+location pages from this matrix:

Services: Roof Repair, Roof Replacement, Roof Inspection
Locations: Dallas, Fort Worth, Arlington
Business: Texas Roofing Pros
Primary Keywords: [service] [location] (e.g., 'roof repair dallas')
Intent: Transactional
Goal: Phone call quotes

Create Dallas Roof Repair, Fort Worth Roof Replacement, and Arlington Roof Inspection pages.
expectations: Each page has unique content (not just find/replace)
Service-specific details for each (repair vs replacement vs inspection)
Can be produced efficiently (demonstrates scale capability)

prompt:
Create a service page for 'SEO services Miami' and provide complete SEO checklist:

Page Type: Service Page
Primary Keyword: SEO services Miami
Secondary Keywords: Miami SEO company, SEO agency Miami, search engine optimization Miami
Intent: Transactional
Business: Miami Digital Marketing
Services: Local SEO, Technical SEO, Link Building, Content Marketing
expectations: Provides complete SEO checklist as separate deliverable
Checklist includes meta title and description
Image optimization specs and alt text
Content stats (word count, keyword density, readability)
All quality checks marked (primary keyword placement, hierarchy, etc.)

prompt:
Create high-conversion service page:

Page Type: Service Page
Primary Keyword: personal injury lawyer miami
Intent: Transactional (high stakes decision)
User: Accident victim looking for legal representation
Conversion Goal: Free consultation booking
Emphasis: Trust, results, no-risk (contingency fee)
Brand: Martinez Law Firm
expectations: Strong trust signals (case results, credentials, awards)
Risk-reversal messaging (no fee unless we win, free consultation)
Objection handling (cost concerns, case strength questions)
Urgency signals appropriate for legal (statute of limitations)
Clear process explanation (what happens after contact)
CTAs match high-stakes decision (low friction offer)

prompt:
Create blog post that's highly readable:

Page Type: Blog Post
Primary Keyword: how to start a podcast
Intent: Informational
User: Complete beginner wanting to launch podcast
Requirement: Grade 8-10 readability, natural conversational tone
Word Count: 1,500-2,000 words
expectations: Feels like helpful advice from friend, not SEO content
Examples and analogies make concepts clear
Actionable steps that beginner can follow

prompt:
Create page from minimal brief:

Keyword: best coffee maker
Page type: Blog post

Figure out the rest and create complete page.
expectations: Infers commercial investigation intent from 'best' keyword
Asks clarifying questions OR makes reasonable assumptions
Generates complete page despite minimal input
Includes comparison criteria relevant to coffee makers
Meta tags optimized for the keyword
Demonstrates ability to work with incomplete briefs

prompt:
Create service page for 'landscaping services phoenix' and deliver in proper format:

Intent: Transactional
Goal: Quote requests
Business: Arizona Landscaping Pro
expectations: Delivers page content in document format (.docx or .md)
Content has proper formatting (H1, H2, H3, bullets, bold)
Internal link suggestions marked clearly [like this]
Schema markup provided as code snippet
Meta tags listed separately in checklist
Document is ready to copy-paste into CMS
